rukus.text: O prophet ! Motivate the believers to fight, if there are twenty patient ones of you, they shall overcome two hundred and if there are a hundred of you, they shall overcome a thousand of those who do not believe because they are a people who do not understand

For the present God has lightened for you (the rule to engage in defensive war) as He knows that there is weakness in you. So if there are a hundred patient ones of you they shall overcome two hundred and if there are a thousand of you, they shall overcome two thousand by the order of God and God is with those who are patient

It is not fit for a prophet that he should take captives until he has thoroughly subdued the land. You intend (to have the) apparent good of the world while God intends (good for you in) the hereafter and God is Mighty, Wise
Had an ordinance from God not gone forth earlier, a great punishment would have befallen you due to that which you took
So eat of the lawful good things from that which you took as spoils of war and fear God, God is certainly Protectively Forgiving, Merciful
